Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe holds immense value and can significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and the benefits it offers, we are confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $8500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate, considering its market value. We look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
